1.content:
All the guys from the most popular Disney shows find themselves locked, with no escape, in a room and a letter appears of which they all read quietly to themselves amongst the confusion. The letter is as follows:
"in this room you are surrounded by your peers. Only one of you will make it out. You all must eat eachother one at a time. You must all agree who will be eaten at the time or you will be dstroyed.
Sincerely, D"

they all look around and stare at Eachother and decide who is to go.
Moises arias. He is thus eaten and they sleep off the small amount of meat they ate. Who is next?
1.title: Begin

11.content:
the next day, they wake from bright lights, everyone stares at eachother with faces of fear and hunger. most are calm until a slit appears in the high white ceiling of which a letter drops saying this:
"now choose one of these ways to cook your next meal as not to be too barbaric." two choices were on the page:
A: rotisserie
B: stew
they all chose stew and chose jason earles to be their food. he submitted and sat in the pot while his coworkers stood around him, stirring, cutting vegetables, poking him with forks, and licking their lips. he also heard one call out, "i call the left leg down!" and another say "dibs on the arm!" and he was eaten...whos next?
11.title: Jason earles

112.content:
another slit appeared in the roof the next "morning". they read the letter, same sas the first, and chose mr. Cyrus. they thought about how to cook him as they looked over the stripped body. the group decided to, after they would baste him, jam a pole up his butt through his body to his neck so they could rotisserie him.

the conversations of his costars was as follows:
" i call his left leg! he has the juciest looking country feet ive seen" mitchell musso said
"i call the other one, he has some meaty calves." david henrie said.
"i want this huge pckage and sausage. " sterling knight said as he basted the spoken of parts.
then hewas eaten...whos next
112.title: Billy Ray Cyrus

14.content:
They all look around the room at the various co-stars. The blonde, blue eyed, California cutie, Sterling Knight. Â Billy ray Cyrus and Jason Earles then ran at him. They practically tore his clothes off him revealing his beautiful body. They stopped to admire him. Billy ray tore Sterling's shoes and socks and just stared.Â 
         "You've got some nice feet boy. I'll enjoy eatin' them." He said, ""Mind if I take a quick taste?" He didn't wait for a response and sucked and chewed a bit on the foot, moaning
         "Yep. You'll be delicious boy."
"Th- th- thanks?" sterling said confused. His erection showing from it.
"I'm gonna enjoy your luscious pec steaks" Jason said. He grabbed them and squeezed. Yep. Nice and juicy.
Mitchell Musso licked his lips while staring at Sterling's Balls and Dick Sausage, tying them to keep them erect. David Henrie called dibs on the calves to share with Dylan Sprouse. Cole sprouse lined him with pineapple slices and stuck an apple in his mouth. They stuck him in a roasting pan and slid him into the giant over. A bit later he was taken out.
https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-rd1KW...
And he was eaten.
14.title: Sterling Knight

info.brief_description: It's all over when the guys of Disney shows are stuck and can't get out
info.description:
Characters: ( Disney, guys only)
-the men of wizards (Justin, Jerry, max)
- the dudes of Hannah Montana (Robby Ray, Jackson, Oliver, Rico)
- the males of suitelife on deck (Zack, Cody, woody, Marcus, mr. Moseby, kirby)
- the bros of sonny with a chanc. (Chad, Nico, Grady)

basic idea-
all the guys of the list above are in a room and can't get out. They are told that only one will survive and the only way one person will get out is if all the rest are eaten (one character eaten per chapter only)
